To access game settings, click the spanner icon in the game panel.
Game Setting Options
MAX BET plays the game at the highest bet level and the pre-selected coin value.
Stake level is the number of coins bet per line.
The stake level is set using the LEVEL selector.
MAX STAKE plays the game at the highest stake level and the pre-selected coin value.
Additional Information
To set advanced autoplay options click AUTOPLAY, and then click Advanced settings.
To set advanced Autoplay settings click AUTOPLAY, and then click Advanced settings.
Note: If you are disconnected while playing, all Autoplay settings will return to default when you reload the game.
Note: When changing Autoplay settings during a game round or Free Spins, all settings will take effect once the game round or feature is completed.
Note: Some autoplay options are mandatory for some jurisdictions.
AUTOPLAY automatically plays the game for the selected number of rounds.
Select the number of spins to Autoplay or view the Advanced Settings to configure stop Autoplay options.
When 3 or more Free Spin symbols appear anywhere on the reels, the bet amount is multiplied by the bet multiplier.
Bet level is the number of coins bet per bet line.
The bet level is set using the LEVEL selector.
The bet level is set using the LEVEL selector.
Button
A bet line win in coins is equal to the value shown in the Paytable multiplied by the bet level.
Stops Autoplay if cash decreases by the amount you specify.
Stops Autoplay if cash increases by the amount you specify.
Click Reset to clear all selected Stop Autoplay options.
COINS displays the number of coins available to wager.
The coin value is set using the COIN VALUE selector.
Free Spins symbols*
With Double symbols, a winning bet line can have from 3 to 10 symbols in total.
Free Spin symbols and medium win symbols can be either single or Double symbols.
Double symbols
Double Free Spin symbols can appear on reels 2, 3 and 4.
Flowers Christmas Edition™ is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot featuring Double symbols, Wild substitutions, and Free Spins with Stacked Wild symbols.
Flowers Christmas Edition™ Game Rules
Flowers Christmas Edition Touch™ is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot featuring Double symbols, Wild substitutions and Free Spins with Stacked Wild symbols.
Flowers™ is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot featuring Double symbols, Wild substitutions, and Free Spins with Stacked Wild symbols.
Flowers™ Game Rules
The Free Spin symbol is a Scatter symbol.
The bet that activates Free Spins is multiplied according to the table based on the number of Free Spin symbols. This amount is added to any bet line wins on that spin.
In Free Spins, 4 or more Free Spin symbols appearing anywhere on the reels activate additional Free Spins.
Free Spins wins are x3.
Free Spin wins are added to any bet line wins.
Free Spins with Stacked Wild

Stops Autoplay if Free Spins is won.

Stops Autoplay if Little WIng Free Spins is won.
Stops Autoplay if Purple Haze Free Spins is won.
4 or more Free Spin symbols appearing anywhere on the reels activate Free Spins.
Any Free Spins won are automatically added to the current Free Spins.

Additional Information
Drag or tap the slider to enable autoplay to set the autoplay options and the number of rounds. Autoplay plays the game for the selected number of spins.
Note: If you are disconnected while playing, all Autoplay settings will return to default when you reload the game.
Autoplay
Drag or tap the slider to enable Autoplay and set the number of rounds. Autoplay plays the game for the selected number of spins.
Autoplay and Quick Spin
The number of spins selected is displayed on the button.
Tap to turn Autoplay on or off without going to the settings menu. Sets 50 rounds by default.
